title: Welcome to MessageHub!
content: We're excited to have you join our community. Start connecting with people anonymously and securely.

title: Important Security Alert
content: Your account was accessed from a new device in Berlin, Germany. If this wasn't you, please secure your account immediately.

title: You have 3 new messages
content: People are reaching out to you! Check your inbox to see who's trying to connect.

title: Weekly Digest
content: Here's what you missed this week: 15 new connections, 8 anonymous messages, and 3 profile views.

title: Feedback Request
content: How are you finding MessageHub so far? We'd love to hear your thoughts on improving the platform.

title: Anonymous Message
content: Hey there! Really enjoyed our conversation yesterday. Looking forward to chatting again soon!

title: Account Verification
content: Please verify your email address to unlock all features and ensure account security.

title: New Follower
content: Someone started following your profile. Check out who's interested in your updates!

title: Platform Update
content: New feature alert: You can now schedule messages and set custom themes for your profile.

title: Community Highlight
content: You've been featured as an active member this month! Thank you for being part of our growing community.

title: Birthday Wishes
content: Happy Birthday! Wishing you a fantastic day filled with joy and meaningful connections.

title: Welcome Bonus
content: As a new member, you've received 100 bonus credits to send premium messages.
